Dear Bookzilla, You have great uploads! 

I'm interested in researching books (Springer, Palgrave Macmillan, Wiley) on foreign direct investments and investments in general It is very vital for my PhD thesis. Please upload if you have something on it. Many thanks in advance! Do ypu have access to Springer, Palgrave Macmillan, Wiley publications? Could you please upload something on economics and business from these publishers? Many thanks from Ukraine!)))
